title: FieldMergeMap
description: Merges values from multiple source fields into a single target field using a specified format template.

ApplyTo.description: A list of Work Item Types that this Field Map will apply to. If the list is empty it will apply to all Work Item Types. You can use "*" to apply to all Work Item Types.

Enabled.description: If set to `true` then the Fieldmap will run. Set to `false` and the processor will not run.
